21-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name, MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up FROM random_company_name_1 AS cn,
   random_company_type_1 AS ct,
   random_keyword_1 AS k,
   random_movie_companies_1 AS mc,
   random_movie_info_1 AS mi,
   random_movie_keyword_1 AS mk,
   random_title_1 AS t
WHERE t.id = mk.movie_id
AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
AND mc.company_id = cn.id
AND mi.movie_id = t.id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND cn.country_code != '[us]'
AND (cn.name LIKE '%m%' OR cn.name LIKE '%e%')
AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
AND k.keyword = 'friendship'
AND mc.note IS NULL
AND mi.info IN ('Iceland:12', 'Japan:30 March 1999', 'India:1963', 'Spain:26 June 1969', 'USA:April 1926')
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1916 AND 2012;

AND k.keyword = 'terrorism'
AND mc.note IS NULL
AND mi.info IN ('A political satire set in Turaqistan, a country occupied by an American private corporation run by a former US Vice-President. In an effort to monopolize the opportunities the war-torn nation offers, the corporation''s CEO hires a troubled hit man, to kill a Middle East oil minister. Now, struggling with his own growing demons, the assassin must pose as the corporation''s Trade Show Producer in order to pull off this latest hit, while maintaining his cover by organizing the high-profile wedding of Yonica Babyyeah an outrageous Middle Eastern pop star, and keeping a sexy left wing reporter in check.', 'Belgium:6 May 2012', 'Russia:1915', 'Spain:14 March 1989', '1342-80')
